summary: This is a notice of non-compliance sent by an Assistant U.S. Attorney to Jack Goldberger and another individual named Black, regarding an unspecified matter. It includes an attached notification letter.

persons.name: Jack Goldberger
persons.context: He is one of the recipients of a Notice of Non-Compliance sent by an Assistant U.S. Attorney.

persons.name: Black
persons.context: He is the other recipient (along with Jack Goldberger) of a Notice of Non-Compliance sent by an Assistant U.S. Attorney.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney
persons.context: The official who sent the Notice of Non-compliance to Jack Goldberger and Black from the West Palm Beach office.

connections.description: Both are recipients of the same Notice of Non-Compliance from the Assistant U.S. Attorney, suggesting they are jointly addressed in a legal matter.
The Assistant U.S. Attorney is sending an official legal notice (Notice of Non-Compliance) to Jack Goldberger.
The Assistant U.S. Attorney is sending an official legal notice (Notice of Non-Compliance) to Black.

events.title: Notice of Non-Compliance Sent
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney sends a Notice of Non-Compliance to Jack Goldberger and Black.

locations.context: Office of the Assistant U.S. Attorney sending the notice.

keyFacts: A Notice of Non-Compliance was sent on June 27, 2008, by an Assistant U.S. Attorney from West Palm Beach, FL.
The notice was addressed to two individuals: Jack Goldberger and a person with the last name Black.
The document references an attached notification letter (080627 Goldberger Black notification Itr.pdf), the contents of which are not provided in this text.
The correspondence indicates ongoing or pending legal proceedings or compliance matters involving Goldberger and Black.
